summary: A virus begins to grip the Earth's population and a group of hopeful survivors are cryogenically frozen in attempt to find a cure. But when the group awakens they are flung into a horrifying situation.
cast: Kana Hanazawa|Toshiyuki Morikawa|Eri Sendai|Sayaka Ôhara|Akiko Yajima|Kenji Nomura|Shin'ichirô Miki|Kôsei Hirota|Ayako Kawasumi|Misaki Kuno|Yoshinori Fujita|Tsutomu Isobe|Patrick Seitz|Brina Palencia|Stephanie Young|John Swasey|Alexis Tipton|Bob Carter|Christopher Bevins|Luci Christian|Anastasia Munoz|Todd Haberkorn|Monica Rial|R. Bruce Elliott|Melinda Wood Allen|Tia Lynn Ballard|Z. Charles Bolton|Chris Burnett|Adrian Cook|Cynthia Cranz|Scott Freeman|Cris George|Josh Grelle|Clarine Harp|Chuck Huber|Jeff Johnson|Kristi Kang|Jamie Marchi|Bryan Massey|Mike McFarland|Wendy Powell|Ian Sinclair|Sonny Strait|Sean Teague|Kent Williams
title: El rey espino
